attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: what next cigarettes under the counter and vending machines banned the gov is taking away our culture and the pub trade is suffering enough. what about the corner shops they depend on tobacco sales to sell impulse lines these will shut soon thanks labour what about sorting the drug culture out it is more dangerous to society

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.  PLease can you be more specific about what you would like to achieve through your e-petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
